unnormalised: Organic farming is the way to go, right? My grandfather, Ramlal from Rajasthan, always said "Back to basics!"  He never used those crazy pesticides.  He just used desi cow dung.  He'd be proud of Krishi Vigyan Kendra's work.  Remember 'Lagaan'?  Even they struggled with the zamindar's demands for higher yields! We need to support organic farmers like Shankar bhaiya in my village. He sells for just Rs. 20/kg more! Worth it for healthy food!
